price: Kuma a lõkacin da Ibrãhĩm ya ce: "Yã Ubangijina! Ka sanyã wannan gari* amintacce kuma Ka nĩsanta ni, nĩ da ɗiyãna daga bauta wa gumãka.
arabic: وَإِذۡ قَالَ إِبۡرَٰهِيمُ رَبِّ ٱجۡعَلۡ هَٰذَا ٱلۡبَلَدَ ءَامِنٗا وَٱجۡنُبۡنِي وَبَنِيَّ أَن نَّعۡبُدَ ٱلۡأَصۡنَامَ
footnotes: * Wannan gari watau Makka. Anã tunãtar da Lãrabãwa ga kãkansu Ibrãhĩm da addu'ar da ya yi sabõda garin Makka da mutãnen garin da ɗiyan Ismã'ila dõmin su wa'aztu.

version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
